title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Cook onion and tomato puree in a pan.
Add cream and grilled chicken pieces.
Simmer and serve with rice or naan.
